overview: Sara Toussaint brings over 10 years of relationship management experience in a variety of industries including academia, sports and law. She currently focuses on partnering with university technology transfer offices to help identify potential investment opportunities for Allied Minds. In addition, she’s responsible for the marketing efforts of the firm and its portfolio companies. Before this role, Sara served as an Associate Director of Alumni Relations for the University of Chicago overseeing the Mid-Atlantic and New England regions. Previously, she spent seven years in sports as Director of Business Development for the Boston Blazers (a startup lacrosse team), an Account Executive for Major League Soccer (managing Allstate, AT&T, Burger King, Makita, and The Home Depot business) and as a Labor Relations Coordinator for Major League Baseball. Sara spent four years at the law firm of Covington & Burling in Washington, DC first as a legal assistant and later in public relations and marketing. Sara graduated from the University of Chicago with a degree in Public Policy and earned her MBA from the NYU Stern School of Business.
